about_the_game:
Summary

War has engulfed the island country of Ashiho.

In this period of strife, some choose to fight under the cover of darkness.

They are called "the Makoku."

The women of this squadron use both their bodies and blades

to lure in and dispatch their opponents.

The few who know of the members of the Makoku fear and respect them,

calling them the "Seductive Twilight Squadron."

Genre

Female Ninja Training Simulation

Story

In a world that doesn't know peace, there are those that operate within the shadows.

Under orders from the country of Hisui, a squadron of ninjas known as "the Makoku"

infiltrate an enemy nation.

However, only three of their number are able to penetrate

the tight security at the border checkpoint and make it through alive.

In order for Mitsuru, the commanding officer of the Makoku, to carry out his mission with

the limited personnel available to him, he resolves to have his female subordinates utilize techniques deemed taboo.

These forbidden techniques utilize "talismans of lust" and are used to seduce the enemy,

thereby creating a fatal opening in their defenses.

Just what would make Mitsuru go so far as to sacrifice his own comrades...?

How to play the game.

Seductive Twilight Squadron consists of three parts, ADV part, training part, and tactical part, totaling five chapters.

The game flow is

(1) Introductory scenes for each chapter

(2) Training Part...After ten days, go to the tactical part.

    A mode in which the girls under his command are trained and disciplined.

    The duration is given ten days in each chapter.

    Two commands can be executed per day: one command during the day and one command at night.

(3) Tactical part…If you conquer the mission, you will go to the H scene.

    At the end of each chapter, the participants will perform their assigned missions on a SLG-style tactical screen.

    The assignment is to sneak into a castle or a mansion and capture the woman who is the boss.

    Victory is achieved by defeating the enemy boss character within 99 turns, and defeat occurs when one of the allies is killed.

(4) H scene (torture event for boss character)

    Once the information is extracted through torture, proceed to the next chapter and start with (1)…

Characters

Nanaha

The leader of the Souga and Mitsuru's former lover.

She is currently being held captive by the enemy.

Mimori

A member of the Makoku and Mitsuru's most trusted retainer.

She was the one who invited Mitsuru to join the Makoku.

Though she possesses a sharp mind and calm demeanor, she has difficulty expressing her emotions.

Asaka

A member of the Makoku.

She is energetic, stubborn, and somewhat hot-tempered.

Despite appearances, she is a hard worker who constantly trains in secret and is exceedingly compassionate.

Yuuki

A member of the Makoku.

A gentle woman who is naive in the ways of the world.

While she has a strong sense of responsibility, she can be quite careless at times.

She becomes embarrassed easily regarding matters of sex due to her lack of experience, but she is someone who will give her all for her partner.

Momo

A former member of the Souga.

While she is clumsy and absent-minded, she is lively and optimistic.

Because she is worried about people underestimating her due to her looks, she pushes herself to appear mature and competent.

Kiri

An agent of the enemy.

Having been saved by Mitsuru, her enemy, she resolves to repay her debt to him.

Once her mind is made up, she will do whatever it takes to accomplish her goals.

She is headstrong and has difficulty adapting to unexpected situations.

Though she may appear tough-skinned, she is actually very sensitive...

content_descriptors.notes:
"Makoku - The Seductive Twilight Squadron" contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are over 18 years of age.
This game has scenes that contain the names of drugs,
the usage of aphrodisiacs, and depictions of sexual bondage.
This game contains abusive language, as well as depictions of violence
and non-consensual sexual activity.
This is a work of fiction.

name: Makoku - The Seductive Twilight Squadron

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 7.0 compatible sound card and latest driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB, Resolution 1080p
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 7.0 compatible sound card and latest driver
